Description: Hand-warmer, spherical and in two halves. The gimbals holding an incense-burner are missing from the interior. The exterior is engraved with a radial design which divides the surface into sixteen petal-shapes filled with, alternatively, chinoiserie floral design and a geometric pattern. Made of engraved, hammered and turned brass; the design is inlaid with silver, chased on its surface.
Funder name: Funded by: Brooke Sewell Permanent Fund
Acquisition notes: Bought; offered for sale at Sotheby's 29/4/1993, lot 86,2 (unsold).
